website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you're looking for an all-natural pet urine eliminator that actually works. Ideal for animals, children, and pet parents who are sensitive to chemicals and harsh fragrances.
pros: Natural organic ingredients are safe for the whole family
Natural enzymes feed off biological waste to remove odors and stains in a single step
Ideal for use on hard-to-clean fabrics like carpets, rugs, mattresses, and upholstery
Easy-use spray bottle comes in handy for spot cleaning
cons: Old, dried accidents might require an extra application or two

website_summaries.verdict: Our pick if you avoid chemicals and will need to use it around kids and/or pets – plus it's effective and very affordable.
pros: A popular cleaner with a reputation for removing strong pet stains and odors
Safe, all-natural formula in a convenient spray bottle
Useful for removing pet odors and stains on rugs, upholstery, and carpets
cons: Mixed reviews on both smell (some think it's unpleasant and "piney") and effectiveness
May stain certain fabrics, so spot test on a non-visible area first

customer_reviews.title: You might want to decant into another better spray bottle, but you shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual product inside the bottle, but as another customer said, the straw inside the bottle is about a quarter length too short so you can't spray it when it gets down to that level, and you end up wasting it when you pour it on the spot. I'm going to buy some more because I like the product, but I wish they put in a better straw that fits the bottle. I took a picture with the top lined up to show you how much space is left.
customer_reviews.author: orchid

customer_reviews.title: It's a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! If I could give this 6 stars I would. I'm a pup sitter and also a clean freak (contradiction? Maybe?). I've been using harsh smelling sprays to eliminate doors and remove the enzymes that attract new pups to pee in the same spot. This smells sooo good, fresh not harsh- seriously like something from the spa. So with it smelling so good I was sceptical. After cleaning a spot with vinegar, baking soda, and another type of cleaner .... This is the only thing that worked! I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Brossard

customer_reviews.title: ** OFFENSIVE STRONG FRAGRANCE
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the most offensive, over concentrated perfume smelling cleaner I’ve EVER used. It takes a WEEK for the ridiculously overpowering perform smell to go away, and even then I can still smell a hint of it. It is midly effective on cat pee, but realistically it covers up the smell more than anything. DO NOT RECOMMEND. Much better is Citrus Magic Pet Cleaner. Absolutely uncented and super effective at cat pee and bodily odor removal, from carpet and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS TOO MUCH LIKE PERFUME FOR ME TO USE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I did a TON Of research and the ingredients in here claim to be fragrance here. I'm not sure what the loophole is in the ingredient listing department, but if you have sensitivities to fragrance you probably won't be able to tolerate the smell this product leaves. It's pretty terrible, in my opinion. I'm sure the product may work well, but if you are sensitive to smells I really wouldn't order this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell, made fresh urine stain worse
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if I got the same product as all the other reviewers. The spray I received smells like strong perfume that spread through my entire house. Nothing that even resembles "mint essential oil." We used it at night on a fresh urine stain and by morning the stain was bigger and more prominent. Plus we had to move the rug outside because the smell was still there. I doubt they'll let me return it, but I'm going to try.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Good smell, not too intense. Much better and more effective than the others I have tried. Fast shipping and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant fragrance, nice job
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for new and great Natural Pet Stain and Odor remover. I really liked the fragrance of TriNova's product. It didn't lift the stain (a fresh one) quite as easily as Nature's Miracle, but after a couple of applications it did the work. I would continue to use this product just for the lovely scent even though it might take more than one application.
customer_reviews.author: B. Radacs

customer_reviews.title: Took two separate spray and dry sessions and a run through the wash, but it worked 100%
customer_reviews.text: My passive aggressive cat peed on my brand new shoes. I doused them in this spray (I used the entire neck of the bottle) and let them dry. They still smelled horrible so I used some stain remover and tossed them in the wash. Still stunk. I sprayed them again with this product vowing to throw them away if it didn’t work this time. After sitting in the sun to dry, they smelled fresh and not even a little like urine. Surprised it took two times based on other reviews, but even more surprised at how pleasant it smells. I’ve used it on my carpet as well. One pass with some sprays and it’s perfectly urine odor free!
customer_reviews.author: AleshaJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Best pet odor remover I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several other odor remover products on my microfiber loveseat to remove a strong cat urine odor and nothing worked. I ordered TriNova because it is plant based and it actually feeds on the stain/odor. I sprayed TriNova three separate times and placed a towel on top each time and the odor is gone! And this is an odor I’ve worked on with other products for several weeks. The fragrance of the TriNova is very nice. I even had other people check to be sure the odor is gone. I’ll definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Heinsohn

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would eliminate cat pee smells when our delinquent cat decided to skip the litter box and use the living room carpet. It did not help eliminate the smell. I understand cat pee is a hard one to treat. However, if that is your problem, skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Randi

customer_reviews.title: Great natural pet stain cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Great for dog and cat pet stains. Unlike some other pet stain products this one doesn’t smell horrible and it’s simple to use. Spray it on the area, wait 3-5 minutes, then wipe away. It worked well on dog pee and poo and removes stains from carpets as well as works well on hardwood floors. It should be safe on marble as well. We have bought it several times for our beagle puppy and it works well when he has an accident. Removes stains from white carpet also, just don’t let the stain sit too long.
customer_reviews.author: VY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and stained sofa
customer_reviews.text: Stained an off-white sofa pink in the spots I sprayed. Not immediately. It took a day or two to turn pink. It also did not affect the cat pee smell. Now it looks like the cat peed pink. Somewhat amusing, however since the smell is as bad as ever, I think replacing the couch will be best.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on dried stains.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cleaner because the description stated this will work on old stains however, the directions clearly state the enzymes literally feed on the stains and if old and dried up the bacteria will die off before it has a chance to work. I let work for five to ten minutes and seemed to work on smell but did nothing to stain. Next time I let soak for an hour, again it worked on the smell but not the stain. It may just be masking the smell, to early to know.
customer_reviews.author: RHJ

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY TO GET THAT CAT PEE SMELL TO GO AWAY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this stuff is AMAZING!!! It’s the only thing that works to get cat pee smell to go away so your cat stops going in a spot he shouldn’t!!!!! I tried everything from cleaning the rug with baking soda to vinegar to even bleach !! Nothing worked to get rid of a cat pee smell. One half of bottle application( it was a large area) and the cat hasn’t even attempted to go back!!!! So excited I was told about this product! Did I mentions it smells awesome!!! And very happy with costumer service !!!!! I Will definitely buy more when I need it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tturtle808

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved me from total embarrassment. I have an old ailing cat. Most of the time he makes it to one of his litter boxes. I was expecting a repairman this morning. When I arose, the smell hit my nostrils. George the cat had not made it to the box. This is the room in which the repairman would be working. I was frantic. I cleaned it up. Then I sprayed this product on both the accent rug and porcelain floor where he had hit. I sprayed and sopped it up about 3-4 times. The smell was gone. I bravely lowered my nose to sniff the rug and the floor and there was no smell. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mshumph

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Pleasant
customer_reviews.text: The scent is really nice, light, and kind of citrusy. I almost want excuses to use it, haha. It's effective at decimating the effects of cat urine. The cat has been stressed lately and urinating on our beds. With the help of this stuff and a wet vac, I am close to totally eliminating all traces of the smell! It's also cost-effective compared to other enzyme cleaners. Will definitely be repurchasing if I need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate picture
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product today. I have yet to try it but hope it works well for cat urine. I have a 4th cat coming home soon; her former owner did not want her anymore after finding out she has spinal lymphoma. Anyways, I'm giving it a 3-star as of this moment because it did not come with a sprayer nozzle. I skimmed through the details just now in case I didn't see a note about a nozzle but it looks like they just didn't include one. Spray bottles are only a few bucks at the store but it is a bit irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wang-Annanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There are better products on the market. My dog had severe diarrhea and I have oatmeal colored shag carpeting. This product was not able to remove the yellow stains completely from the carpet. It has a very strong floral odor--which some people might not mind, but I didn't like it, and dog keeps going back to the same spot to potty--so I don't feel like the odor is really removed. I don't recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover EVER
customer_reviews.text: We've had dogs for years, and doggos make messes. Puppies have accidents, dogs have muddy paws...you name it. We used to use Nature's Miracle for dog accidents but I wanted something natural and a friend recommended this. Not only does it WORK better, SMELL better and is better for the enivronment, it also cleans OTHER stains better than Nature's Miracle. There's no stain my 8-year-old son has made on my WHITE carpets and sofas (what was I thinking?) that the TriNova hasn't gotten out! My husband didn't believe me but when he saw the difference? He was hooked! It's some of the cleanest/greenest/meanest stuff we've found and we swear by it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Headache inducing citrus odor
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work but the intense citrus odor is absolutely headache inducing and it lasts for days. I felt terrible for using it because if it bothered me, then for dogs with their MUCH better noses this must have been truly awful. I used my carpet steam cleaner several times to get rid of it as best as I could.
customer_reviews.author: simchri

customer_reviews.title: Horrible caused odor to spread worse than using nothing at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible made urine stain smell worse. Tried on all kinds of surfaces. Did ok on floors. DO NOT use on fabric,— seems to cause odor to spread. Agree if you have odor sensitivity you won’t be able to use this. UPDATE I got horrible blisters where this solution touched my skin. BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: We have a bad kitty who keeps using the basement to leave her mark and we cannot find the spot. I have tried several enzyme cleaners and cannot seem to find one that actually works. I bought this one based on the other reviews, but alas still stinky. And the smell of the cleaner smells like intense bergamot and gets strong to the point that it takes the breath away after spraying a bit. Oh, and the sprayer has broken about 2/3 of the way through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: K French

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Suck At All. Buy This One.
customer_reviews.text: What a relief! I had to be refunded for a gallon of the worst smelling Nature's Miracle possible. I never even broke the seal on the bottle and it still was as strong as if I'd rubbed it in my sinuses. This, however, is fabulous. Serves the same purpose--enzymes and whatnot. Overall, it's more expensive--but it is worth it. It smells really nice, actually. And it's a "quiet" smell. Definitely not overpowering. Who wants to add heavy perfume to pee smells? Not me. If you're comparing pet stain and urine removers, trust me. This is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Caught it during the Prime Day sales at a great, low price and even lower expectations
customer_reviews.text: Caught it during the Prime Day sales at a great, low price and even lower expectations. I am a first time dog owner and brought my puppy home a couple days after receiving the cleaner. There have been a few accidents during housebreaking and this cleaner has erased all evidence - smell and visible stain alike! I was entranced I tried it on old (non puppy related) stains on both the sofas and carpet and it removed them completely. I'm in awe and will most definitely repurchase! I will check out other products from this brand as well. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: naturally

customer_reviews.title: Only product that works for me
customer_reviews.text: My cat had urinary issues and occasionally used my couch as a litter box. I tried other products, but the smell remained. They would seem to work but when my friends came over they would tell me they could smell urine. It was embarrassing. I sprayed this product and waited a little while then wiped it off. Then I sprayed again after an hour. The odor is gone! The fragrance ingredients are amazing, such as eucalyptus, nothing sweet like you are trying to cover up the smell. Although strong at first, it dissipates. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPBFL

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews on Amazon, but I received the pet stain and odor remover yesterday. I have purchased many different other products off amazon for cat pee and this product is the one that worked the best .. I would highly recommend it.. I have a senior cat that has been missing the litter box and this product removed all the stain and odor
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described on cat urine. I use it to wipe the inside sides of my jumbo litter boxes since my 3 cats insist on backing up to those sides. It removes both the urine and odor from the plastic sides. It also has a nice pine scent that isn't overwhelming. My first bottle arrived damaged but the seller was quick to notify Amazon to send a replacement. Great customer service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: NancyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic to remove unpleasant odours
customer_reviews.text: I initially received this product for free a few years ago to try. The dogs didn't have any "accidents" so I did not have occasion to try it on pet stains. However, this fall we had a very minor sewer backup (just around the floor drain) and as you can imagine, it was very stinky. I tried all kinds of products, including bleach and still the smell remained. Then I remembered having the TriNova Pet Stain and Odour Eliminator stuff and gave it a try. IT WORKED!! No more stink. So, in closing, I can't comment on how it actually works on pet stains, but it works like a charm on odours. That's why I just ordered another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Lynn Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: It's the best product for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12-year-old cat. I've tried many kinds of enzyme pet stain &oder products and found that they smell different and have good performance. But because the smell was not good for me, I have been looking for a product that smells good every time. I just want to say thank you to the people who found the best product for me and made this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is really working. I sprayed it on and thoroughly wet a blanket and a rug that my Yorkie puppy peed on. Let it dry, then washed both. She peed in the same place on both items. Next, I sprayed and let it dry on another rug she peed on. I didn't wash it. She peed on it in the same place. The scent is not too awful but VERY strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing. And I don’t have to worry about chemicals around the pups because it’s literally enzymatic bacteria and essential oils (well, obviously there are more ingredients but I can pronounce them all). And the smell is DIVINE. I legit sprayed down my floors and swiffer-mopped just to have the scent. It takes away about 90% of the urine smell from my pup. It’s a god-send. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Great product...highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for many years and have consistently been very pleased. We have a large number of cats and dogs as we provided a home for older and special needs animals. As one might imagine, we also have a certain number of "accidents". We find that the TriNova Stain and Order Remover is very effective, easy to use and "cost-friendly." Customer service is also great. They are very proactive and interested in the satisfaction of their customers. I highly recommend this company and their product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.text: The pet stain and oder eliminator product is the best product I have ever used. I was reminded of it today when two of my dogs decided to get sick. It is the only thing that truly gets the smell out and doesn't change the color of my carpet. I am ordering more today for myself and for my parents. Keep it up. Love this stuff! FYI: I have been using this product on stains for over a year. I have tried everything under the sun from DIY "mixes" to OXI brands and other carpet cleaners. Believe me, this stuff is the best. I'm not sure how they do it.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe C La Pan

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Some people complained of strong scent but I found it to be very pleasant and not too strong. This works well on new accidents before they're dried up. Doesn't help on old stains.
customer_reviews.author: LOM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 chihuahuas and two cats. On occasion we my wife and I watch several dogs from coworkers. With all of those animals, not all are fixed. Because of this, some decide to mark "their" territory, their territory being the base of the kitty tower. I sprayed this one it, let it sit for about 10 minutes then used paper towels to blot it dry and voila, like magic the stain and order was gone. It's only been a day but none of the 8 dogs currently in my home are lifting their legs to urinate in that spot. Will provide an update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: BornLove

customer_reviews.title: The Black Light Test
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on our new carpet because the darn dogs thought it would be great to color it! I use a black light in the dark to find all spots. The spots are "lighter" but not gone so I can't say this spray is five star stuff. Plus I have sprayed those spots 3 times....gets expensive because this product isn't cheap. It smells good and is easy to use but I am looking for a product that will make those spots disappear completely or almost completely.
customer_reviews.author: AZironbutt

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet stains
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have around the house if you have pets. Whether it's hairballs or urine stains, this cleaner handles it. And the bonus is that I love how it smells! I like it so much that I use it for a lot of other stains and smells around the house. And the cats do not seem turned off by the smell. I will say that I don't know how it would work with bad stains - it gets cat puke out of the carpets but I haven't needed it to get harder stains out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick--no pun intended!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cleaner after reading reviews online. It did not disappoint. Our dog had been sick for several months before passing away, so was having daily accidents near the end. This cleaner was effective and safe. It even worked on the sofa. I would say it seems to work better on removing smells than stains. It also says on the bottle that it doesn't work well on old stains, which I would agree. It has a very strong smell until it dries, which can be unpleasant. It is fine once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent, or rather, odor
customer_reviews.text: My bottle arrived in a wet box left on the porch by the mailman. I could smell it as soon as I opened the door. It smells a bit like pine oil. I wish someone would manufacture an odor eliminator that was odorless itself. These products are so strong they stink a bad as the urine they claim to eliminate. This one isn’t any better, no matter what the manufacturer says.
customer_reviews.author: Xerxes

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up great
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a big diarrhea and peeing accident on my carpet. I tried to clean it with my carpet cleaner, but it didn't come up that much. I found this online and decided to try it. I only had to spray it 2 times for the stain to be gone. I was amazed. The only negative was the urine smell took a few more times to get out. I couldn't see that stain, but I kept smelling it. I think it's finally gone after spraying it for several days. I highly recommend this, though. I thought my carpet was ruined until I used this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sowers

customer_reviews.title: A must for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd bottle...with 5 dogs, it's a must to treat rugs. We have a large jute rug in our entryway. My mom's elderly dog has occasional accidents and it always seems to be on that rug. I tried a foaming carpet cleaner but it turned that spot green! In a panic, I soaked up as much as I could with a towel and sprayed this stuff. It took away the urine smell AND the greenish spot! I also use it to spray on doggie play areas to freshen it up and get rid of the doggie smell. Nice fresh scent and not harmful to pets :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance but strong
customer_reviews.text: It does have a nice floral fragrance (smells like the spa) but it is pretty strong. I would prefer if they toned it down on the fragrance. I think it's working to zap the underlying odors but I'm trying to clean up dried urine from a new apartment I just moved into and I think they may have painted over the bathroom walls where the previous resident urinated on, so not sure if this is the right solution or if I have to tear down the bathroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Anne

customer_reviews.title: Masks odors only
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to eliminate the odor as opposed to masking it.. while the scent isn't bad, because the product doesn't actually eradicate the odor, I get a whiff of the product as well as the cat urine. The perfume smell is strong, but the urine is, unquestionably. still there.
customer_reviews.author: BargainShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have carpet in my daughter's bathroom because she is disabled, and slips on regular flooring. She doesn't always make it to the bathroom in time, and ends up having accidents. We do buy a new carpet about every three months, which does get expensive over time, but since using this product, I think we will be able to wait a little longer. It really does get rid of all odors and stains. I spray the carpet every day now as a preventative measure. It has been working well for us. I just wished the scent was stronger and would last all day.
customer_reviews.author: bombaycat

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find an all-natural cleaner to use for any pet-related accidents. This cleaner does a decent job of pulling up stains from my off-white colored carpet. It seems to work best with stains that haven't set as much. For example, my cat got sick in the night and I did not see the mess until morning. The cleaner was able to remove most of the stain, but not completely. My biggest complaint would be that it definitely has a distinct smell, and I don't love it. But the odor dissipates completely after a day.
customer_reviews.author: BParker

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I foster for a few rescues and end up with un-housetrained dogs pretty often. I've tried probably a dozen different products, but so far this one is definitely my favorite. The smell isn't nauseating or overpowering, and it does a good job to minimize pet odors. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it still does not "eliminate" everything 100%, I'm not sure anything does. If you find something, let me know! For now I'll stick to this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling enzymatic cleaner I’ve ever had! Doesn’t really last long though, a lot comes out with one spray so I’m being more frugal with it as it’s really expensive... lol. It’s only been a few weeks and it’s almost gone.? I also think it’s got rid of the smell but not stopping my dog from repeating marking the same spots. I do love it’s natural ingredients and doooo recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: good for fresh stains and minor cases
customer_reviews.text: this product worked amazingly on fresh stains but not so much on old stains. I'm not disappointed however as it does say on the bottle that it most likely isn't good for use on old stains; the smell is really good but the musty smell of old cat pee sort of overpowered it after a few days. doesn't deter cat from peeing on the floor in the same spot and the straw in the sprayer is a bit short. overall good for minor stains or fresh stains while house training but if you have a recurring issue with a trained pet or have old stains like I do it's not the best.
customer_reviews.author: dani ♡

customer_reviews.title: Used when potty training
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray while potty training a puppy. It does remove stains (it is always better to clean the mess up from carpet ASAP to ensure this). I have not tried it on stains older than a few days. It also smells good, not like a strong chemical spray. The only reason I give it 4 stars is that on longer shag/cottony carpet it does not completely remove the smell (on short carpet it does). On longer carpet it tends to mask the urine smell with the spray's own smell, no matter how much I used. If you have shorter carpet however this spray is great, it smells good and will remove the stain.
customer_reviews.author: Rilee Reddeng

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I inherited a Yorkie when my grandmother passed. He pees everywhere not because he isn’t let out into a large fenced in yard. He marks everything because he is a jerk. Luckily for him, he’s an adorable jerk. I smell pee, I spray. Pee smell gone. I’ve tried so many products. This one works. It’s saved my life. It smells so light and refreshing with zero hint of urine. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JMomi

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well on used living room chaise
customer_reviews.text: Worked extremely well on a used lounge chair I purchased. It had been in a home but seemed to be the favorite place for a husky to lay! Although it is high quality, there were lots of old stains on the footrest area. I followed the directions on the bottle. It did take 1/2 the bottle to get it where I was comfortable using it. I used 12 old kitchen towels and could see the dirt coming out of the fabric. It dried quickly and had a nice smell. Dog odor is a memory! Dirt is gone! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Positive reviews must have been bought by the company
customer_reviews.text: I have to assume most of the good reviews here were paid for. Especially ones comparing this to Nature's Miracle. This enzyme does a terrible job of cleaning and really only masks the smell even after several applications. Having to use twice as much as I would of Nature's miracle for half the results. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Very effect with urine and feces odor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've got so far. We have a springer spaniel puppy who is still being potty trained. This product eliminates the smell of urine and feces from our hardwood floors and area rugs. Very easy to use and has a pleasant scent. If you don't like pine, don't buy it, because this is a pine scent (which I love!) The best surface I've tried this was on my laundry room which is title. I recommend this product. I will keep you posted if I have any discoloration on my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Balu

customer_reviews.title: Pet stain spray
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients of this product, but I have seen mixed success in using it on a rug we have...sometimes it has worked well and others not so much. However, we did try other popular products and they didn’t seem to work as well as this
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells GREAT and really works well!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new house and my dogs got so stressed, one of them peed a few times in the basement on the on sealed concrete floor. It soaked in quickly and I was worried the smell wouldn't come out. Boy I was wrong!! I sprayed the spot, let it dry thoroughly and then sprayed again. I smells really, really good! Also, once my dog has an accident in the house, she usually keeps peeing on the same spot. She hasn't done that after I used this odor eliminator.
customer_reviews.author: KerriB

customer_reviews.title: Masks odors. Doesn’t eliminate them.
customer_reviews.text: This spray seems to just mask odor temporarily and not actually eliminate it. I also hate the smell. It’s very strong. Once the perfume smell dissipates, the original odor is back. I used this to freshen up my couches. I have a big dog and she makes the couches a bit smelly. This doesn’t help. It smells like cheap green tea perfume. I can’t imagine that it would work on something like urine, feces, or vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats (I know... ) and they often pee in places where they KNOW they should NOT, just to be annoying or make a point (whatever that may be). I have even had one pee in my purse! Grrrr... So I have tried a lot of products and some are good and some are just OK. This product is like a miracle cleaner. Cat peed on the rug at the front door and on the door itself, (again) and I used this spray as instructed, and while I was hoping it would help take the stink out, it was GONE!!! One use and the smell was non-existent! I am impressed!!!!!! If you have naughty cats, GET THIS SPRAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: Im waiting for the applicator for me to treat my carpet. I did use this on a Karastan carpet when there was a stain and it made the area worse. Im going to try this on the upstairs carpet where my dog with kidney disease urinated. The smell is great and you can open the bottle. The proof will be when I use it on the pet stains upstairs. I cannot comment on the value until I try it again.
customer_reviews.author: rocket0001

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We moved twice in 6 months--second move to a new build house. Kitty was upset after second move in such a short time and pooped a few times outside the litter box. This got rid of the odor in the carpet, making life more pleasant for us. Even better, kitty apparently no longer smells poop in those places and has stopped pooping there and is only using his litter box again. Thank you. We highly recommend this product. And it has a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Works Superbly on Odor
customer_reviews.text: We have six cats, none of whom urinate other than in the cat litter box. One got trapped in our den with the door closed for several hours and urinated on a couch. Having been a cat owner for decades, I thought the odor was our newest long-term guest. This product immediately took the odor away, it left a slight fragrance (slight to us, I've read reviews stating it is stronger), A slight stain remains, but that can be easily removed. We recommend this product unreservedly!
customer_reviews.author: W J O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works on first application
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many different recipes I found online to try to get rid of human waste smell & none could get rid of the smell completely. I was ready to throw the items away. Then I started looking on Facebook & people would recommend cleaners that had enzymes in them. That’s when I looked on amazon & found this. It work on the first application. I wish I’d found this in the first place. It would of saved me a lot of time & money.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca lutes

customer_reviews.title: NOT for MCS!
customer_reviews.text: If you have multiple chemical sensitivities (MCS), this product is NOT for you. The smell of it made me very very ill. Yes, I know, it's supposed to be "all natural," etc., but the amount of essential oils and extracts in it makes it smell like the most obnoxious perfume ever made. Choking, horrible.
customer_reviews.author: xyrid

customer_reviews.title: This product deserves 20 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is spectacular. I purchased a black light as well so I could see all the stains. Because I could see all the stains in order to treat them, I was also able to watch them all disappear after using this product. The smell is pleasant and it’s all natural. I will always have a bottle of this in my house. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hughes

customer_reviews.title: You must have a wonder dog for this thing to work
customer_reviews.text: This spray definitely does not work for my dogs they keep on marking at the same place after repeat cleaning and spraying. Change to PurAyre, it works like day and night. How this gets four stars is beyond me. I have no association with Ayre just read my other reviews for accuracy. I am so irritated with so much time wasted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Outside the Box

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, sometimes it takes a few applications to remove stubborn old spots. However, IT DOES WORK! While not the most fun, best result I had was to soak up as much of the spot as possible with paper towels. Apply TriNova (after shaking), let it soak for 15-30 minutes, and then soak up again. If you are not satisfied with the results the first time, repeat the process.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Natural Pet Stain and Odor Remover Eliminator THE BEST EVER!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this PET UNBELIEVABLE CARPET STAIN CLEANER -TriNova Natural Pet Stain and Odor Remover Eliminator THAT HAS SAVED MY DAUGHTER'S CARPET!!!! She just got this adorable Goldendoodle puppy that is only 8 weeks old who has had many accidents but TriNova Natural Pet Stain and Odor Remover Eliminator cleaned every spot perfect. Buy this you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: I switched my order from quarterly to monthly; guess that means I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen where some users didn't like the scent; I can't explain what it smelled like, but it was not offensive to me! I have an older cat who seems to think my breakfast area is his personal litter area; NOT!! I cleaned up after him then saturated the pull-up rug with this. I needed to do it twice, more for my own piece of mind, but the good news is, he stopped going there! Yay for me!
customer_reviews.author: tmon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Cat Urine
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pet stain product I have used. It has a nice clean scent and does remove the urine smell when my cat has an accident. Usually I do have to apply a second time, but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to remove pet odors. I spray it around the floor by our little boxes and it works instantly to neutralize odor. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: grandmadidi

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great and has a nice scent which over the day gets less strong and then it's gone and so is the pee order from the enzymes! I made sure to soak the pee spot well so that the enzymes could work on the whole stain in carpet and padding. Waited several days to let the enzymes do their job and then I cleaned with carpet cleaner and no more smell or stain.
customer_reviews.author: ep

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is too strong
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be unscented or have a natural smell. Unfortunately, that is not the case. The smell is quite strong and not pleasant. I do have a sensitive nose and do not like "fragrance". So if you don't usually seek out unscented products, it's probably fine for you. I did not like it and won't be using it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Truly works on dog pee! Effective on blood too. Best when used with hairdryer.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous products for pet urine on rugs (old dog with a weak bladder). This is the only one that truly works. Not a perfumed mask for urine odor, this actually eats it away. I found it works best to saturate the area then use a hair dryer on warm until damp dry. Turns out this works great on blood stains too (Yoga studio - used on meditation cushions that had menstrual blood on them). And it seems to be free from toxic chemicals. Winner.
customer_reviews.author: yogini

customer_reviews.title: Works the best of any cleaners I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended it to friends; smells great and works great. It may need to sit a bit, even overnight, for tough stains, but it will come up. I use it on all stains-not just pet stains. I dumped an entire cup of green smoothie on my off white carpet, and it took it up, after several applications and patience. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Smells soooo good
customer_reviews.text: I have told all of my friends about this cleaner. We have 6 pets and are in love with this product. We have tried other "earth friendly" options, but this one takes the cake. I LOVE the scent too!
customer_reviews.author: AECastle

customer_reviews.title: over powering odor
customer_reviews.text: First off, I had a horrible time just getting the cap off. I had to break it into pieces. Then, the straw on the sprayer is too short, and it took a little work to get it seated correctly so it wouldn't leak. But, the worse was yet to come. The odor has affected my sinuses to the point where I almost need to wear a mask to protect myself. Had hoped the odor would have lessened overnight, but that isn't the case. I cannot use this product. And I certainly can't recommend it. I have no idea if it got rid of the pet odor because the scent is too overpowering to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!💯♥️
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. Switched from Nature's Miracle after their formula changed, and stated smelling chemically. Never going back, this stuff smells GREAT and is wayyy more natural. Works GREAT on the usual pup smells, and I also use in the ARMPITS of our human clothes 😊 Really pleasant stuff, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Dolla

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is garbage. It smells pleasant but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is garbage. It smells pleasant but that's about it. Did nothing to remove two fresh pet stains (my dog vomited in one area and urinated in another). There are other highly recommended enzyme cleaners that I should have bought but this was a bit cheaper, and I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: One of the best stain AND odor removers I have used!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does what it says it does and does so very well. I have no idea why some people claimed it stinks, but personally I find the smell like a version of Downy and quite pleasant. It doesn't linger long but there is certainly no really bad smell some people have complained about. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Just switched from another brand
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have a cat who sometimes refuses to use the litter box, and things were getting pretty stinky. I had been loyal to another product that just wasn't cutting it any more, so I tried TriNova. It worked instantly. I like the scent although some people might find it too strong. It sure beats the smell of cat piss, though. I will keep using this product as long as I have this willful cat.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I take this product with me on vacation because now that we have a dog, we have to rent dog friendly houses. And the first thing you will find in a dog friendly house 9NOT ALL OF THEM BUT MOST) is dog piss and nasty odors. Most people I have found don't housebreak their dogs very well. So I spray the edges of the furniture, beds, just anywhere I see my dog sniffing around a lot and it takes his attention away from those areas. Makes the whole place smell a little fresher also.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It has a pleasant scent and I used it in my bathroom because I just had this bad odor. I sprayed it all around a few times and the odors are gone.
customer_reviews.author: cpaat200

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains and odors quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products to remove and or deter an animal from returning to the same spot to use mark their territory. This is the best product by fire. My mini golden is 4 months and has had accidents but Trinova eliminates stain and odor. I would highkt recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Works great I have three labs so you know I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have three labs so you know I have to spray everything to get dog smells out It's not urine it's just the daily dog smells on rugs furniture I use everyday and will continue to purchase Customer support is great too
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Not just a cover up, it works and removed the urine smell!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my second batch of this stuff! It works great! We have two little dogs that really did a number in my daughters room. We tried everything, carpet cleaners, baking soda, commercial pet order removers and they all left the urine smell in the carpet. I ordered this based on the reviews and am very happy with the results. It's got a nice smell when applied but it doesn't just cover up the urine smell, it seems to remove it. As I mentioned, I just received more so I can touch up the spots that I've missed and/or that the dogs have reclaimed.
customer_reviews.author: Southbound

customer_reviews.title: A product that works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My carpet had dog pee odor that I just couldn't get rid of. Found this product, read the reviews and decided to give it a try. It works folks!!!! Pee smell gone and I couldn't be happier. Now that particular area smells good. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee70122

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it works, but I'm confused if this can be used on dry urine? I wet the area with water and spayed. It took a few tries and I had to use an upholstry cleaner. At first I thought I could spray a lot and let it dry, but this has a very pungent smell and it would not go away, so I had to suck as much of it out as I could with the carpet cleaner, now it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: SRHadden

customer_reviews.title: Works good smells nice
customer_reviews.text: This works really good I have a puppy and we're in potty training. His urine is not dark and smelly so I can't say much to that but this is easy to use just shake and spray wait a couple mins and wipe there's no odor of accidents and this leaves a nice smell on the carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works phenomenally!
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly amazing! We have cream-colored carpets in our apartment and a 9-week old puppy who is still potty training. There have been several accidents, but ZERO stains because of this product. It is plant-based so I am not worried about potentially-harmful chemicals in my puppy's environment. Not only does this product remove stains and odors, but it has a refreshingly pleasant aroma that delicately lingers for about 20 minutes. The puppy has never once returned to the same spot to potty, indicating that he cannot smell where he pottied in the house before. I will be recommending this to all pet owners I know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product
customer_reviews.text: As all pet owners experience, removing odor and stains from carpets is literally impossible. Most products will work to some extent but they don't work 100%. This product is amazing! I've used it once and it has literally transformed my carpet to a "like new" condition. There are a couple of spots that I will need to hit again but the majority of them disappeared completely and the best part....the odor was eliminated. The majority of these spots were old stains that I had tried treated before. I had even had them cleaned professionally. No matter what I used, the odor and/or stains lingered. This product really did the trick. I plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also makes House trim look like new!! Goodbye filmy mildew!!
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews about this product are "spot" on. It's amazing. But I wanted to just say that I noticed quite by accident that the stuff also completely dissolves that mildew/moldy stuff that tends to slowly cover painted trim on home exteriors. I thought I would have to completely repaint all my trim. Instead, I sprayed a little of this stuff on and scrubbed moderately with thre rough side of a sponge, then hosed it off...and viola!!! It's like my trim has just been given a new coat of paint!!! I will definitely be keeping plenty of this stuff around!
customer_reviews.author: AFJN

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  A+
customer_reviews.text: I wanted good solutions for cat pee. This TriNova did a fantastic job. No smell after using it! The light product smell disappears soon after and there is NO cat pee smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Second time order
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this and I really like it. It has a pleasant smell and I think is does a good job on the cats' messes.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: consistency is key here
customer_reviews.text: consistently gets the stain out and consistently leaves behind the same smell which is much better than the odor left behind from urine. Doesn't seem to leave behind any residue and I've used it on the hard wood floors, tile and of course carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Raymond

customer_reviews.title: This one actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Spray on carpet or furniture and the pet smell is gone. Doesn’t always work on old messes that the animals manage to hide but works amazingly if sprayed within several hours. We have a large puppy and now buy this by the gallon. Also, works really well on pet vomit.
customer_reviews.author: grtmomx3

customer_reviews.title: Best product of it's type!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for pet stains and odors. We recently purchased a home of which the previous owners had cats. They had urinated on the concrete pad in the furnace room that smelled horrible. Normal cleaning agents including bleach couldn't remove the odor. After three treatments of spraying the affected area (spray and don't remove) the odor is now gone, We have also used this on our hardwood floors after our dachshund puppies left a stain that was virtually eliminated after treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product has an appealing citrus fragrance. I used the product on a seat cushion stained with male feline urine, and there is still a faint odor. This product eliminated the urine stain immediately, but it did not completely eliminate the urine odor.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: The cat pee is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old cat that seems to prefer my bedroom carpet for his bathroom. I’ve just had it cleaned professionally and purchased this Tri nova in case of more accidents. So happy I did! He used my carpet again so I followed the directions and the stain came out and the smell too! I will be continually reordering as needed. Big bottle too. Great size for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Does not Work for Light Carpets & contains Hydrogen Peroxide
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the spray does not work on light carpets. My carpet is white off color and, even after multiple applications of this product, the traces of light yellow still remain. The smell of the product is very strong and perfume like. The product contains hydrogen peroxide, which induceds nausea/vomiting in dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is straight up witchcraft. Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has saved my carpet. My dog has had a few accidents in my guest room and I've tried other carpet cleaners specific for pet smells and it just made it smell like chemicals and urine. This actually got rid of the smell and leaves a slight fresh scent behind (very mild). I also used it on an old stain (not pet related) and it cleaned it up completely. This stain was over a year old and it came out. Crazy. Witchcraft, y'all. Severus Snape made this potion HIMSELF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As noted in previous review, I found product to ...
customer_reviews.text: As noted in previous review, I found product to do as advertised and spots disappeared. Some spots did take more than one treatment. Not just pet spots, but spots made from Gatorade(orange). Used on several spots, have many more to go. Product does have a strong smell first but it does dissipate in a few hours. I personally did not find the smell as offensive as most commercial products.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.Walker

product_meta.title: TriNova Natural Pet Stain and Odor Remover Eliminator - Advanced Enzyme Cleaner Spray - Remove Old & New Pet Stains & Smells for Dogs & Cats - All-Surface Safe
feature_bullets: ✅ 100% NATURAL CLEANER - We are setting the "Green Standard' by using only natural and organic ingredients in our formula and listing everything right on the label.

✅ PROFESSIONAL STRENGTH - TriNova's Pet Stain & Odor Remover features a blend of natural enzymes that tackle stains and odors at their root to clean and neutralize. The enzymes work to break down the stains, drying out and disintegrating when they're finished to restore your carpet to like-new condition.

✅ SAFE Around Kids & Pets - TriNova understands your pets frequent the spaces where you and your children spend the most time as well. Because of this, TriNova's Pet Stain & Odor Remover contains a formula that leaves surfaces safe for your kids to keep on playing without any worry about harmful chemicals or toxins.

✅ USE IT ANYWHERE - Use this natural pet stain remover on most surfaces such as bedding, mattress, cage, kennel, laundry, clothes, hardwood, litter box and more. Even use it for small animals like hamsters, rat, and mice cages
✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We think you'll love our product, but if you don't just let us know and we'll refund your purchase price!
